programme.title: Crystal Palace vs. Liverpool - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: Crystal Palace have won just one of their last 16 Premier League meetings with Liverpool, winning 1-0 at Anfield in April 2024. The Eagles haven’t scored more than once in any of their last 12 league games against the Reds. Liverpool have won nine and lost none of their last 10 away league games against Crystal Palace – this is their longest ongoing unbeaten run away from home in the league against any side.

programme.title: Brentford vs. Manchester United - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: Brentford have won two of their last three home Premier League games against Manchester United, as many as their first six home league matches versus the Red Devils beforehand. After their 4-3 defeat in May, Manchester United could lose back-to-back league meetings with Brentford for only the third time, after previously doing so in the second tier in December 1934 and top-flight in February 1937.

programme.title: Newcastle United vs. Arsenal - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: Newcastle United have won each of their last three home games against Arsenal in all competitions without conceding a single goal, while they last won four in a row at home to the Gunners in August 1969. Under Mikel Arteta, Arsenal have only lost more away games at Manchester City in all competitions than they have away to Newcastle United.

programme.title: Kairat Almaty vs Real Madrid - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2
programme.desc: Kairat’s game against Real Madrid will be the just the second fixture played between sides from Kazakhstan and Spain in the European Cup/UEFA Champions League, after Astana’s meetings with Atletico Madrid in the 2015-16 group stage. Real Madrid have only lost three of the last 30 instances when facing a team for the first time in the European Cup/UEFA Champions League, suffering defeats against Lille in 2024, Sheriff Tiraspol in 2021 and Wolfsburg in 2016.

programme.title: Galatasaray vs Liverpool - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2
programme.desc: Galatasaray and Liverpool will meet for a fifth time in European competition, with both sides managing one victory apiece across the previous four. This will be their first game against each other since a 3-2 win for Galatasaray in the UEFA Champions League in December 2006. Liverpool are winless in their previous two away trips to face Galatasaray, 1-1 in February 2002 and losing 3-2 in December 2006. The only teams they’ve faced away from home more often in the European Cup/UEFA Champions League without winning are Chelsea and Napoli.

programme.title: Barcelona vs Paris Saint-Germain - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2

programme.title: Al Sadd SC (QAT) vs Sharjah FC (UAE) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD2
programme.desc: Al Sadd are unbeaten in each of their previous two meetings with Sharjah in the AFC Champions League Elite, while keeping a clean sheet in both of those games; in fact, Al Sadd are unbeaten in each of their last 16 games against sides from UAE in the competition. Sharjah have conceded multiple goals in each of their last three games in the AFC Champions League Elite, including their opening game of the ongoing edition ; if they concede multiple goals in this game, they will equal their longest such run in the competition.

programme.title: Al Ittihad Club (KSA) vs Shabab Al Ahli (UAE) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD2
programme.desc: This will be the first meeting between Al-Ittihad and Shabab Al Ahli in AFC Champions League Elite history; teams from Saudi Arabia have won seven of their last eight games in the competition against teams from UAE, however, the one loss in this run was Al-Ittihad’s 1-2 loss to Al Wahda in their opening matchday of the 2025-26 season. Al-Ittihad have lost each of their last three AFC Champions League Elite games, their joint-longest run of such games in the competition, including a 1-2 loss to Al Wahda on Matchday 1; Al-Ittihad have never lost each of their first two games of an AFC Champions League Elite campaign and only twice have they failed to win any of their first two games.

programme.title: Leeds United vs AFC Bournemouth - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6

Bournemouth have never won back-to-back league meetings with the Yorkshire club.

programme.desc: This will be the third meeting between Atletico Madrid and Eintracht Frankfurt in European competition, with the previous two coming in the last 16 of the 1975-76 Cup Winners’ Cup, and both won by the German side. programme.title: Rayo Vallecano vs Sevilla - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 7
programme.desc: Rayo Vallecano have won only one of their last 19 matches against Sevilla in LaLiga, 0-1 in October 2022. programme.title: Valencia vs Real Oviedo - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 7
programme.desc: Valencia have not lost any of their last nine matches against Real Oviedo in LaLiga – although they have drawn five of them – the longest unbeaten run against the Asturian side in their history in the top-flight. programme.desc: Barcelona have lost two of their last five matches against Real Sociedad in LaLiga, twice as many defeats as in their previous 16 encounters with the San Sebastian side in the top-flight. programme.title: Monaco vs Manchester City - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2

programme.title: Toulouse vs Nantes - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 6

programme.desc: Qarabag and Copenhagen have faced each other on four previous occasions, with all four of those coming in qualifying matches. programme.title: Qarabağ FK vs Copenhagen - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2
programme.desc: Qarabag and Copenhagen have faced each other on four previous occasions, with all four of those coming in qualifying matches. Copenhagen progressed from the first of those ties, before Qarabag progressed from the most recent. In 1998-99, Copenhagen won 10-0 over two legs against Qarabag in qualifying for the Cup Winners Cup. Including qualifiers, this remains the Azerbaijani side’s heaviest ever defeat over two legs against a European side.

programme.title: Borussia Dortmund vs Athletic Club - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2
programme.desc: Borussia Dortmund and Athletic Club will face each other for the first time in European competition, while this will be Athletic’s first game against a German side in the European Cup/UEFA Champions League. Borussia Dortmund have only lost three of their 16 home games against Spanish teams in the UEFA Champions League, while only Real Madrid have managed to beat them by more than a single goal – doing so in the 2017-18 edition which they went on to win overall.

programme.desc: Qarabag and Copenhagen have faced each other on four previous occasions, with all four of those coming in qualifying matches. programme.title: Sanfrecce Hiroshima (JPN) vs Shanghai Port FC (CHN) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - East MD
programme.desc: This will be the first time Sanfrecce Hiroshima and Shanghai Port face off in the AFC Champions League Elite; Sanfrecce Hiroshima have won just two of their 10 games against opponents from China in the competition, with a win in their most recent such game. Shanghai Port are currently on a five-game losing streak in the AFC Champions League Elite, last registering a win on 26 November 2024 ; in fact, they have lost each of their last seven games in the competition against opponents from Japan.

programme.title: Chengdu Rongcheng FC vs Gangwon FC (KOR) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - East MD2
programme.desc: Chengdu Rongcheng will face Gangwon for the first time in AFC Champions League Elite; each of the last three games in the competition between teams from Korea and China have been won by the former by an exact 2-1 score, including Gangwon’s win over Shanghai Shenhua in the first round of the 2025-26 season. Gangwon beat Shanghai Shenhua 2-1 in their first ever AFC Champions League Elite game at home; the last Korean side to suffer at least one defeat in their first two games in the competition is Jeju United in 2011, while no side from Korea has suffered defeat in their first away game in the AFC Champions League Elite.

programme.title: Pafos FC vs Bayern Munchen - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2
programme.desc: This will be the 50th game between Cypriot and German teams in major European competition, while only on one previous occasion has a Cypriot side won : APOEL Nicosia 2-1 Berliner FC Dynamo in the European Cup first round in October 1980. Bayern Munich have won all six of their previous game against Cypriot sides in European competition, scoring 31 goals and only conceding twice across the six matches. The most recent of those, however, came back in October 1990 in a 4-0 win over APOEL Nicosia in the European Cup.

programme.title: Vissel Kobe (JPN) vs Melbourne City FC (AUS) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - East MD2
programme.desc: This will be the first AFC Champions League Elite fixture between Vissel Kobe and Melbourne City; City are without a win in any of their three Champions League Elite games against Japanese sides, while Kobe have won their only previous game against an Australian opposition in the competition. programme.title: Shanghai Shenhua FC (CHN) vs Ulsan HD FC (KOR) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - East MD2
programme.desc: Ulsan HD have won each of their three AFC Champions League Elite games against Shanghai Shenhua, scoring at least two goals in each of those games; in fact, they have won seven of their last eight such fixtures against Chinese teams, with their only defeat in that period being a 1-3 loss to Shanghai Port on 26 November 2024. Shanghai Shenhua have failed to score two or more goals in each of their last three AFC Champions League Elite fixtures, the last time they went on a longer such run was a stretch of six games between April 2009 and April 2011.

programme.title: Olympique de Marseille vs Ajax - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2
programme.desc: Marseille lost their first three meetings with Ajax in European competition, but have since gone unbeaten across the last five, most recently beating them in November 2023. programme.title: World Athletics Championships Tokyo 2025 - Day 9 – Evening Session
programme.desc: The World Athletics Championships 2025The greatest athletes from around the globe compete for glory in Tokyo.The twentieth edition is hosted by the National Stadium, 13th – 21st September.

programme.title: My Faith in Sport
programme.desc: Ramadan is a crucial period in the Islamic calendar but fasting (Sawm) can provide complications for athletes who are trying to compete at the highest level. But to what extent is fasting a negative or can it actually aid performance? We look at the life and adaptation throughout Ramadan of Adam Azim – an unbeaten professional boxer from the UK, Fares El Bakh – a weightlifter who won Qatar’s first ever Olympic gold medal, and Zainab Alema – a rugby player who is aiming to become the first player to represent England wearing a hijab.Experts in Sports Science and Nutrition from Aspetar Clinic, Qatar also add detail of the physical impact athletes encounter during Ramadan

programme.title: FK Bodø/Glimt vs Tottenham Hotspur - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2
programme.desc: The only previous meetings between Bodø/Glimt and Tottenham came in May of this year, with the English side winning home and away in the UEFA Europa League semi-finals, before going on to lift the trophy. Bodø/Glimt have lost 100% of their games against English sides in major European competition ; their worst losing record against sides from a single nation. All of those defeats have come in the UEFA Europa League since the 2022-23 campaign.

programme.title: Gold Standard Ep3
Jannik SINNER (ITA) vs Learner TIEN (USA) - China Open, Beijing - 2025 - ATP 500 - Final
programme.desc: Jannik Sinner vs Learner Tien. Sinner reaches his third straight Beijing final—his 30th tour-level title match and ninth in a row on hard courts. Teenager Tien, 19, is into his first ATP final after Medvedev retired in the semis. First meeting between the pair. Fast hard court favors Sinner’s first-strike baseline power; Tien counters with speed and resilience. 500 ranking points and the Beijing crown at stake.

programme.title: History of the Asian Games
programme.desc: From its beginnings to today, the Asian Games torch lighting has become a dazzling showcase of creativity and technology. Each edition brings fresh innovation, with Doha 2006’s unforgettable horse-and-rider moment still hailed as a highlight. As the 2026 Games in Japan draw near, excitement builds over what new spectacle will capture the world’s imagination.

programme.title: Bayer 04 Leverkusen vs PSV Eindhoven - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2
programme.desc: Bayer Leverkusen and PSV have met twice previously in European competition, with both coming in the first round of the 1994-95 UEFA Cup. After a 5-4 home win for Leverkusen in the first leg, the second leg in the Netherlands ended 0-0. Bayer Leverkusen are unbeaten in their seven meetings with Dutch sides in European competition, with the most recent coming in the UEFA Champions League last season, in a 4-0 win over Feyenoord in the league phase.

programme.title: Newcastle United vs Arsenal - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Newcastle United have won each of their last three home games against Arsenal in all competitions without conceding a single goal, while they last won four in a row at home to the Gunners in August 1969. Under Mikel Arteta, Arsenal have only lost more away games at Manchester City in all competitions than they have away to Newcastle United.

programme.title: Atletico de Madrid vs Real Madrid - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 7 -Mini Match
programme.desc: Atletico de Madrid have not lost any of their last five matches against Real Madrid in LaLiga and could equal their best ever run without defeat against Los Blancos in the competition, achieved in February 2016, also under Diego Simeone. Real Madrid have lost two of their last four LaLiga away games against Atletico de Madrid, after suffering only one defeat in their previous 20 visits to Rojiblancos ground in the competition.

programme.title: Barcelona vs Real Sociedad - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 7 -Mini Match
programme.desc: Barcelona have lost two of their last five matches against Real Sociedad in LaLiga, twice as many defeats as in their previous 16 encounters with the San Sebastian side in the top-flight. Real Sociedad have lost 26 of their last 27 visits to Barcelona in LaLiga, with the only exception in this run being their 2-1 win in May 2023. They have suffered 67 away defeats against the Azulgranas in their history in the competition, at least 11 more than against any other opponent.

programme.title: EN EPL Review 2025/26 | E6
programme.desc: Highlights from the latest Premier League Matchweek. Review incorporates all the key moments and manager reaction from every fixture, making it a must-see programme for all Premier League fans.

programme.title: Kairat Almaty vs Real Madrid - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2
programme.desc: Kairat’s game against Real Madrid will be the just the second fixture played between sides from Kazakhstan and Spain in the European Cup/UEFA Champions League, after Astana’s meetings with Atletico Madrid in the 2015-16 group stage. Real Madrid have only lost three of the last 30 instances when facing a team for the first time in the European Cup/UEFA Champions League, suffering defeats against Lille in 2024, Sheriff Tiraspol in 2021 and Wolfsburg in 2016.

programme.title: Galatasaray vs Liverpool - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2
programme.desc: Galatasaray and Liverpool will meet for a fifth time in European competition, with both sides managing one victory apiece across the previous four. This will be their first game against each other since a 3-2 win for Galatasaray in the UEFA Champions League in December 2006. Liverpool are winless in their previous two away trips to face Galatasaray, 1-1 in February 2002 and losing 3-2 in December 2006. The only teams they’ve faced away from home more often in the European Cup/UEFA Champions League without winning are Chelsea and Napoli.

programme.title: Brentford vs Manchester United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Brentford have won two of their last three home Premier League games against Manchester United, as many as their first six home league matches versus the Red Devils beforehand. After their 4-3 defeat in May, Manchester United could lose back-to-back league meetings with Brentford for only the third time, after previously doing so in the second tier in December 1934 and top-flight in February 1937.

programme.title: Crystal Palace vs Liverpool - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Crystal Palace have won just one of their last 16 Premier League meetings with Liverpool, winning 1-0 at Anfield in April 2024. The Eagles haven’t scored more than once in any of their last 12 league games against the Reds. Liverpool have won nine and lost none of their last 10 away league games against Crystal Palace – this is their longest ongoing unbeaten run away from home in the league against any side.

programme.title: Panathinaikos FC vs Go Ahead Eagles - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD2
programme.desc: The 2025–26 UEFA Europa League is the secondary club football tournament organised by UEFA. This is the second season played under a new format, which replaced the 32-team group stage with a 36-team league phase. Tottenham Hotspur are the reigning champions. The final will be played on 20 May 2026 at Beşiktaş Stadium in Istanbul, Turkey.

programme.title: Rotherham United vs Bradford City - EFL - English Football League SkyBet - League One 2025/2026
programme.desc: Live and exclusive action from the EFL (English Football League) One. EFL One is the third-tier in the English football league system. At the end of each season three teams are promoted to the EFL Championship and the four clubs that finished at the bottom of EFL League One are relegated to EFL League Two. The season runs from 8 August 2025 until 2 May 2026.
